Text: I've trying to download this for hours unsuccessfully. It starts fast with many seeders but then stops every minute with error, that it cannot read the data it's downloading, I have no problem with other downloads, just this one... PLEASE, do something, now I'm stuck at 35% and advance only from 0.2% to 0.2%, I want the books but it's taking ages....

I finally could download, BUT please DON'T put brackets in the folder's name, some of us still use Win98 and that gives an error message, I could only download with XP. Brackets are unnecessary, hardly anybody uses them here and it screws us up. Thanks.
